channel.title: Help with added custom's
channel.description: When i add a custom i have made when you weild it and go into that thing that shows what you wearing it say's "existing item !!!!" how do i change what that to say the name of my wepon???

item.title: Help with added custom's
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

you have the client side bit done.

now open your server source, in the config folder there will be a file called item.cfg (this opens in notepad, or whatever you use), in there you need to add the item like such:

item = 13899	Vesta Longsword	A reward from Pking.		32453997	17000000	14575098	106	121	-2	0	0	1	4	3	0	0	98	0

You can edit prices (first 3 numbers) and stats (rest) to your liking…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with added custom's

item.description:
@noobyest_noob wrote:

can you please help me out fether because i dont know where to find the template’s or anything or what to do when i have found them

Read full topic

item.title: Help with added custom's
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

The top of your ints it says the item ID, template that with an existing item say 1167 no idea what it is but you could use it if you check what it is, like bronze longsword, you can use that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with added custom's
item.dc:creator: @noobyest_noob noobyest noob
item.description:
@noobyest_noob wrote:

i’m not quite with you. coul you please help me out a little more… sorry im noob…
these are my int i have for the vestas’s longsword

if (i == 13899)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anInt174 = 9511;
class8.anInt181 = 1900;
class8.anInt190 = 572;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 9519;
class8.anInt200 = 9519;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.aString170 = “Vesta’s longsword”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “This item degrades in combat, and will turn to dust.”.getBytes();
}

do you think you could write me up the code your talking about…

oh and btw my sever is a 317

Read full topic

item.title: Help with added custom's
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

add it to item.cfg
use another item already listed as a template, then input the item id, name, stats, etc etc for this

Read full topic
